PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2012-02812012-03-08,  ,  FIN,  ,  , 
ActNunavut Act
SubjectBorrowing Limit - Nunavut
PrecisOrder (a) repealing Order in Council P.C. 1999-456 of March 18, 1999; (b) approving the borrowing of money from time to time, by the Commissioner of NUNAVUT, on behalf of the Government of NUNAVUT, for territorial, municipal or local purposes, provided that the aggregate, from all sources, of all borrowed principal amounts outstanding and accrued interest, does not exceed the sum of $400 million.
AttachmentsAttachment
